page.title: 19THE VILLAGE BREAKFASTS
page.content: This event must be a unique community service to the tourist trade in Cornwall. On eleven summer Saturdays the { {Village Hall}is open from 6am until 9.30am serving breakfasts to those visitors who have travelled through the night.It is a community service because all the organisations who use the hall take charge of a Saturday. Each provide enough helpers to park cars,work in the kitchen and serve the breakfast. The finances are beneficial to both hall and organisations as it is the policy of the hall committee to share profits,half to the hall and the rest divided equally between the organisations. The 1984 profits exceeded Â£1600. The Hall's share is used for major projects,for example,a clubroom was built in 1981.
